      • Ball

        public Ball(Image img,
            int x,
            int y,
            int dx,
            int dy,
            long time,
            Controller controller)
        The contructor of the Ball object with one image.
        Parameters:
        img - the image of the ball
        x - x coordinate of the ball image
        y - y coordinate of the ball image
        dx - horizontal movement speed of the ball
        dy - vertical movement speed of the ball
        time - sleeping time of tha ball
        controller -

      • Ball

        public Ball(BallImagePair imagePair,
            int x,
            int y,
            int dx,
            int dy,
            long time,
            Controller controller)
        The contructor of the Ball object with a pair of two images.
        Parameters:
        imagePair - the pair of the two images of the ball
        x - x coordinate of the ball image
        y - y coordinate of the ball image
        dx - horizontal movement speed of the ball
        dy - vertical movement speed of the ball
        time - sleeping time of tha ball
        controller -
